Class Planets

java.lang.Object
Sun
Planets
Direct Known Subclasses:
Asteroids, Moons
public class Planets extends Sun
This is the file which contains the code for planets for the Solar System project

  • Constructor Details

    • Planets

      public Planets(double dist, double angle, double dia, String col, double centreDist, double centreAngle, double rotationSpeed)
      Constructor Method
      Parameters:
      dist - The distance value for the planet
      angle - The current angle of the planet
      dia - The diameter of the planet
      col - The colour of the planet
      centreDist - The distance of the planet from the sun
      centreAngle - The angular part of the polar co-ordinate about which this object orbits
      rotationSpeed - The velocity which the planet is travelling at
